attributes.action: Oppose the proposed mimnimum price on alcohol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been reported Professor Sir Liam Donaldson is set to call for a ban on drinks being sold for less than 50p per alcoholic unit - it would mean most bottles of wine would cost at least £4.50.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
